original: Big MT: I, Dr. Mobius, will soon control you - and all of Science!
translation: 大山脉：我，莫比乌斯博士，即将成为你的主宰——还有全科学的主宰！

original: Mighty Think Tank... still c-c-c-c-cowering in your Dome? Cower, you fools. Cower.
translation: 万能的思想体们…打算继续缩在穹顶里？那就缩着吧，你们这些蠢货。缩着。

original: Time to reward myself with a little breath-freshening Mentat. Mmmm.
translation: 是时候奖励自己一点曼他特了。仿佛重获新生。嗯嗯嗯。

original: Try to leave your Dome, Think Tank, and you will be punished by the pincered might of my Robo-Scorpion army!
translation: 离开穹顶试试，思想体，我的机械蝎大军会用有力的钳子好好招待你们！

original: Think Tank... I wouldn't even use binary to describe my exponential hatred for you.
translation: 思想体们…二进制都无法尽述我对你们的仇恨，指数级的仇恨。

original: My aggression is increasing geometrically. Do you hear me, "Think" Tank?!
translation: 我的攻击性正以几何级数增长。听到了吗，思想体们？！

original: Soon... all Science will be mine.
translation: 很快…科技将尽归我手。

original: Oh, Klein - did I mention that my zone is FORBIDDEN to you? Ha ha ha ha ha! SO forbidden.
translation: 哦，克莱因，我说过禁止你来我的领地吗？哈哈哈哈哈！非常禁止。

original: 2 plus 2 equals... 4-Bidden, idiots of the Think Tank!
translation: 愚蠢的思想体们，2加2等于…4倍的禁止！

original: I hope I didn't leave my Giant Robo-Scorpion on. That thing eats power like no tomorrow.
translation: 希望我没忘记关掉那只机械巨蟹。那家伙是个吃能量大户，像是吃了上顿就没下顿一样。

original: I'll just set this on repeat while I go relieve my tank... no one will know.
translation: 在去休息的时候，我会设置成循环播放…没人会发现的。

original: Rant! Rant! Rant! See how I abstract my rage, Think Tank? I hold you in such disdain I generalize my hatred for you!
translation: 怒吼！怒吼！怒吼！思想体们，看我是怎么形容愤怒的。对你们，我不屑一顾，根本懒得费口舌去仔细描述我的愤怒。

original: Go, my mighty Robo-Scorpions. Crawl in search of intelligence. Then, sting said intelligence, yes, sting it.
translation: 上吧，我强大的机械蝎，给我找到智能体。然后，蛰他们，对，狠狠地蛰。

original: My Robo-Scorpions will soon conquer the Crater. It's just that this is a big place, so it's hard to conquer everything.
translation: 我的机械蝎即将征服整个环形坑。不过这里确实挺大，完全攻克大概不容易。

original: Klein... remember the time you forgot to carry the 2 and nearly blew up the Y-0 Research Center? Oh, wait, you did! Or was that me?
translation: 克莱因…还记得那次你少进个2，结果差点把Y-0研究中心炸平的丑事吗？哦，等等，就是你吧！难不成还能是我？

original: Klein, as useless as the bottle of the same name... well, except as an example of an object that uselessly tries to fulfill its purpose.
translation: 克莱因，你就和克莱因瓶一样毫无用处…哦，除了用作反面教材，一个“试图实现目的却徒劳无功”的物事。

original: -The Cazador Preserve and the Nightstalker Splicing facilities are strangely quiet. TOO quiet.-
translation: -猎蜂保护区和夜行兽基因移接实验区还真是安静啊，静得都有点不寻常了。-

original: -X-8 and X-13 and X-2 are your DESTINATION, non-Lobotomite. Can you HEAR us?! You MUST hurry!-
translation: -X-8、X-13还有X-2是你的目的地，不是无脑人的无脑人。你能听见吗？！你必须快点！-

original: -What TERRORS does Big MT hold for the intrepid seeker?! Really. Does anyone know? I'm at a loss.-
translation: -大山脉 为无所畏惧的探险家准备了怎样的恐惧呢？！说真的，有人知道吗？我一直想知道。-

original: -BEWARE Dr. Mobius' army! His Robo-Scorpions crawl everywhere, in SEARCH of intelligence to devour and stupify!-
translation: -小心莫比乌斯博士的大军！他的机械巨蝎到处乱爬，捕食智慧生命，并向他们发射致愚光波！-

original: -Anyone who can understand these messages - YOU DO NOT BELONG HERE! We will FIND you!-
translation: -任何能听懂该信息的人，你不该来这儿！我们会找到你的！-

original: Slight chance of seed dispersal from Botanical Gardens predicted in the late evening.
translation: 今天傍晚，植物园方向可能会吹来一团种子云。

original: There is no standing on the green pipes. If you are standing on the green pipes, please get off them at once.
translation: 不要站在绿色管道上面。要是你站到了上面，请立即离开。

original: If you see Robo-Scorpions, do not attempt to fight them. They will shoot you with their robotic stingers, and then... possibly explode.
translation: 要是碰到机械蝎，切勿尝试与其对抗。它们会用机械尾刺向你射击，然后…可能会爆炸。

original: Do not attempt to breach the Big MT force fields. Doing so could allow dangerous ideas and/or creatures having those ideas to escape.
translation: 不要尝试破坏大山脉的力场。该举动不仅会放出危险的想法，还会放出带有这些想法的危险生物。

original: Are you out there, my little teddy bear Lobotomite? Dala misses you and the pitter-patter of your penis feet so much.
translation: 我亲爱的小泰迪熊无脑人，你在哪里？达拉非常想你，还有你长着生殖器的脚落地时的啪踏踏声。

original: DR. MOBIUS, SURRENDER YOURSELF. YOU CANNOT WIN DESPITE THE FACT THAT THE ODDS ARE HEAVILY IN YOUR FAVOR.
translation: 莫比乌斯博士，投降吧。尽管你已很有胜算，你仍然不可能获胜。

original: ATTENTION: THE BLUE GRASS SURROUNDING THE DOME ABSORBS ALL FERTILIZER, INCLUDING FECAL MATTER. THIS DOES NOT GIVE YOU LICENSE TO EXCRETE ON IT.
translation: 注意：穹顶周边的蓝草能吸收所有肥料，包括排泄物。但这不意味着允许你在上面排泄。

original: X-12 IS CLOSED UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE. ON AN UNRELATED NOTE, WHOEVER CLOSED X-12, PLEASE REPORT TO THE DOME.
translation: X-12已被关闭，直至另行通知。说句题外话，不管是谁关闭了X-12，请立刻向穹顶报告。

original: PLEASE AVOID BOOM TOWN FOR THE FORESEEABLE FUTURE, UNTIL WEAPON TESTING IS RESOLVED.
translation: 在可预见的未来里，请勿靠近“新兴城市”，直至武器试验结束。

original: ATTENTION: BIG MT. THIS IS AN URGENT MESSAGE. IF YOU HAPPEN TO SEE A GECKO... ECKO. ECHO? ECH-O. ECHOOOO. ECHOOOO.
translation: 注意：大山脉实验基地，这是一条紧急通知。如果你碰巧看到一只蜥蜴…蜥蜴…回声？蜥蜴蜴蜴。蜥蜴蜴蜴蜴。蜴蜴蜴蜴。

original: THE REST OF YOU SHOULD TRY THIS INTERCOM THING. IT MAKES YOU SOUND LIKE SOME KIND OF... SKY-GOD!
translation: 你们其他人也应该试试这个对讲机，它让你听起来有点像…天空之神！

original: ALL LOBOTOMITES, PLEASE STOP MILLING ABOUT. REALLY.
translation: 所有的无脑人，请停止你们无目的乱转的行为，真的。

original: *Attention: Big MT. There is a 95% chance of clear skies interrupted with artillery fire.*
translation: *注意：大山脉研究中心。接下来晴转炸弹雨的概率是95%。*

original: *Attention: Lobotomites. Do not neglect to wash the Walking Eye!*
translation: *听好了，无脑人，别忘记去洗步行眼！*

original: *The Uncanny Valley research center has been canceled until further notice. As in, until someone notices it.*
translation: *恐怖谷理论研究中心目前已关闭，直至另行通知。就是说，呃，在有人收到通知之后。*

original: *We are reading increased levels of berserkity in Securitrons from the De-Construction Plant.*
translation: *检测到拆解工厂内电子保安的狂暴指数正迅速飙升。*

original: *Force fields can only be disrupted by a specific frequency. If anyone has found the frequency, last seen around X-8, let the Dome know at once.*
translation: *力场只能被某个特定频率破坏。如果谁找到那个，呃，丢在X-8附近的频率，请立刻到穹顶报告。*

original: *Do not approach the pylons. Pylons are the glowing things. Also, do not approach a fallen pylon. If you see a fallen pylon, call security.*
translation: *不要接近任何雷达塔。雷达塔就是会发光的东西。还有，不要接近任何倒下的塔。假如某个雷达塔倒下了，马上呼叫安保人员。*

original: Some of the flayed Hopeville soldiers looked like NCR... but fought beside others in Legion armor.
translation: 黎明镇上那些剥了皮的士兵看起来像是NCR...但是和他们并肩作战的人却身着军团的盔甲。

original: You see true. Not scavengers... it's what they wore before this all happened.
translation: 你看到的是真的。不是拾荒者...这仅仅是他们在这一切发生之前的打扮而已。

original: [NCR] Those soldiers in Hopeville... were once NCR, I'm sure of it. Why were they with the Legion?
translation: [NCR]那些在黎明镇的士兵...曾经是NCR，我敢肯定。他们为什么和军团在一起？

original: Those Marked Men in Hopeville - some had strange masks and blades I'd never seen before.
translation: 那些黎明镇的烙印者...有些人戴着我从未见过的奇怪面具和刀刃。

original: You haven't seen enough of the Legion yet to see what they worship... what they hold on to, even after what happened to them.
translation: 你还没见识过足够的军团去理解他们所崇拜的...以及他们所坚持的，即使在他们身上发生了那些事之后。

original: [Legion] Those Legionnaires in Hopeville wore Legion armor - and strange masks and blades.
translation: [军团]那些黎明镇里的军团士兵穿着军团盔甲...还有奇怪的面具和利刃。

original: [Legion] The dead in the silo, some were Legion Frumentarii, scouts. Assassins.
translation: [军团] 发射井里的尸体，有些是军团的特务、侦察兵、刺客。

original: Might have been. Once. To the Divide they came... in the Divide, they rest.
translation: 可能是吧。曾经，他们来到大裂谷...他们正在休眠，在大裂谷里。

original: [NCR] Those bodies in the silo were NCR soldiers... some special forces.
translation: [NCR] 那些躺在发射井里的尸体是NCR的士兵...某些特种部队。

original: Might have been. Once. To the Divide they came... in the Divide, they rest.
translation: 可能是吧。曾经，他们来到大裂谷...他们正在休眠，在大裂谷里。

original: [Legion] You've been to Denver? That's Legion territory.
translation: [军团] 你去过丹佛？那里是军团的地盘。

original: Mojave and the Divide aren't the only places I've walked.
translation: 莫哈维和大裂谷不是我唯一走过的地方。

original: I don't understand why you didn't kill me in Primm.
translation: 我不明白为什么你在普瑞姆没有杀了我。

original: Promises to keep. 'Courier shall not kill Courier.' Always - let them live, spread the word.
translation: 信守承诺。“邮差不得杀死邮差。”永远 - 让他们活着，传播消息。

original: [Legion] You didn't kill me in Primm because you still thought I was Legion.
translation: [军团]你在普瑞姆没有杀我是因为你还以为我是军团的人。

original: Promises to keep. 'Courier shall not kill Courier.' Always - let them live, spread the word.
translation: 信守承诺。“邮差不得杀死邮差。”永远 - 让他们活着，传播消息。

original: You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: 你可能不相信有国家，我相信。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Your actions have carried strength.
translation: [成功] 你的行动承载着力量。

original: [NCR] Even if you have no faith in the NCR, I do. My actions have proven it.
translation: [NCR]就算你不信任NCR，我信。我的行动已经证明了这一点。

original: [SUCCEEDED] There is conviction in your words, enough to rival a Legate, perhaps Caesar. You believe what you say.
translation: [成功] 你的言语充满信念，足够媲美一位特使，也许凯撒也行。你相信自己说的话。

original: [Legion] The Legion is stronger than you know. If you would judge them, hear me first.
translation: [军团]军团的力量比你所知的更强大。如果你要审判他们，先听我说。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Your actions have carried strength. More importantly, not for House, but for the families on the Strip.
translation: [成功] 你的行动承载着力量。更重要的是，不是为了豪斯，而是为了长街上的家族。

original: [Vegas] Even if you have no faith in Vegas, I do... and my actions have proven it.
translation: [维加斯]就算你不信任维加斯，我信...而我的行动已经证明了这一点。

original: [FAILED] Words are not enough to bear the weight of your flag - if you follow anything at all.
translation: [失败]言语不足以承载你旗帜的重量 - 如果你追随着什么的话。

original: Speeches are things of NCR, words without strength. Your actions have shown nothing. Your flag will burn. The Mojave will follow.
translation: 演讲是NCR的小伎俩，是没有力量的言语。你的行动没有证明任何事。 你的旗帜将被烧毁，莫哈维紧随其后。

original: [NCR] You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: [NCR]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

original: [FAILED] You came from the West, walked there. You carry its sickness East to the Legion - and do not believe their cause enough to honor them.
translation: [失败]你来自西方，行走在那里。你把它的弊病带给了东部的军团 - 却不相信他们的事业，不尊重他们。

original: What I give the Legion is a swifter death than the disease you bring. You have not the strength to bear a Legion standard.
translation: 我给予军团的将是比你带来的疾病更快的死亡，你没有力量来承受军团的旗帜。

original: [Legion] You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: [军团]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

original: [FAILED] You serve Vegas ghosts, not the tribes Vegas devoured. House is not the people of Vegas - you have walked the Strip, yet have seen nothing.
translation: [失败]你为维加斯的幽灵服务，而不是被维加斯吞噬的部落。豪斯不是维加斯的人民 - 你走过长街，却什么也没看见。

original: Your carelessness for the paths you walk - it has destroyed the city you serve. NCR will burn. Then the walls of Vegas will follow.
translation: 你对自己走过的路漫不经心 - 这已经摧毁了你服务的城市。NCR会燃烧，然后维加斯的城墙也会随之倒塌。

original: [Vegas] You might not believe in nations. I do.
translation: [维加斯]你可能不相信国家了。我信。

original: If you speak for the two-headed Bear, I'll hear your words. Even if I will be the only one to hear them.
translation: 如果你要为双头熊说话，我会倾听你的言论。即使我是唯一的听众。

original: If you believe it should not die this day... then answer me why.
translation: 如果你认为它不应该在这一天死去...那告诉我原因。

original: If you feel I do not know the Legion's strength - then I will listen.
translation: 如果你觉得我不了解军团的力量 - 那我也会听着。

original: If the ghosts of Vegas have come from behind their wall to speak for the West, I'll hear their words.
translation: 如果维加斯的幽灵们从围墙后走出来为西部说话，我会听到他们的话。

original: If you believe that Vegas does not deserve to die as the Bear does... then answer me why.
translation: 如果你认为维加斯不应该像熊一样死去...那就回答我为什么。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你是什么意思？

original: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: 大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [NCR] NCR would have needed this supply line open to reinforce the Mojave - and Hoover Dam.
translation: [NCR]NCR需要这条补给线开放来增援莫哈维...和胡佛大坝。

original: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: 大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [Legion] The Legion would want to cut this road off if it had been a supply line to Hoover Dam.
translation: [军团]如果这条路是胡佛大坝的补给线那军团会想把它切断的。

original: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: 大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [Legion] Killing NCR, cutting off their supply line at the Divide serves Legion, as do we all.
translation: [军团] 杀死NCR，切断他们在大裂谷的补给线对军团有好处，对我们也一样。

original: Serves the Legion?
translation: 为军团服务？

original: I carry no hatred for duty... if that's what this was. The Divide was more than that. Its people, more than that.
translation: 我不憎恨责任...如果这就是的话。大裂谷不止于此，它的人民，不止于此。

original: [Legion] The dead? You mean your brothers in the Legion - our brothers.
translation: [军团] 死者？你是说你军团里的兄弟...我们的兄弟。

original: The Legion who died here... they didn't deserve to die, like those that died in the fires of Boulder City... bombs, Hanlon's gifts.
translation: 死在这里的军团...他们不应该死去，就像那些死在巨石城大火中的人一样...炸弹，汉隆的礼物。

original: Their deaths were mercy compared to those who still walk. Any who die beneath the flag of the Bull... their death should be in battle.
translation: 与那些仍在行走的人相比，他们的死亡是仁慈的。任何死在公牛旗帜下的人...他们应该死在战场上。

original: But no... the dead number more than my brothers.
translation: 但是不...死者的数量比我的兄弟要多。

original: [NCR] The dead? You mean the Republic troops who were here?
translation: [NCR] 死者？你是说这里的共和国军队？

original: The soldiers of the Bear? They were dead already, their symbol... diseased. Deserved to die as my brothers did at Boulder City, mines, bombs.
translation: 熊的士兵？他们已经死了，他们的象征...病态。就该像我的兄弟们在巨石城那样死去，地雷、炸弹。

original: I carry nothing for them. Their deaths here were a mercy - compared to the ones that still walk the Divide.
translation: 我没有带给他们任何东西。他们死在这里是一种仁慈 - 与那些仍在大裂谷中行走的人相比。

original: [Legion] I'll see that you answer for it.
translation: [军团] 我会看到你的回答的。

original: Then Legion kills Legion. Farther you walk from the flag of the Bull, the more West creeps into you.
translation: 然后军团杀死了军团。你离公牛的旗帜越远，西部就越深入你的心。

original: [Legion] I didn't side with the Legion until the Mojave.
translation: [军团] 直到莫哈维我才站在军团一边。

original: I know that now. Doesn't change what was done. The Legion who died here.
translation: 我现在知道了。但这并不改变已经发生的事，这里死去的军团。

original: Legion doesn't know your history. I do. They find out what happened here, how many of their own died... they'll want an answer.
translation: 军团不了解你的过往，我了解。他们发现了这里发生的事情，死了多少自己人...他们需要一个答案。

original: If you meant to kill me, you should have done it long ago.
translation: 如果你想杀我，早就该动手了。

original: I believed in what I followed then. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
translation: 我相信我当时所遵循的。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。

original: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. Now, our allegiances are reversed.
translation: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。现在，我们的立场颠倒了。

original: [Legion] Being Frumentarii kept you from killing me in the past. You have no such defense now.
translation: [军团]作为一个军团特务，你过去没有杀我。你现在没有这种防备了。

original: Not if you believe in what you follow. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
translation: 只要你相信你所追随的就不会。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。

original: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. The truth is, you serve nothing, believe nothing. Killing you... meaningless.
translation: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。但事实是，不为任何人服务，什么都不相信。杀了你...没有意义。

original: [Legion] You said you'd sworn not to kill me. If you're Legion, why are we at odds?
translation: [军团] 你说你曾发誓不会杀我。如果你是军团，为什么我们会有矛盾？

original: You struck first. Not just at me... at the Legion. Or so I thought. Not sure of the history of it now.
translation: 你先出手的。不只是对我...对军团。或者是我这么认为的。现在还不确定这段历史。

original: Whatever flag you follow, or followed then... either way, you got too much of the Bear's sickness in you to live. Divide's proof of that.
translation: 无论你追随什么旗帜，或者当时追随的什么...不管哪种，你身上有太多熊的疾病，无法生存。大裂谷就是证明。

original: Want more than that, walk the road. Answers'll come, closer you get to home... you and that machine.
translation: 想要更多，那就上路吧。答案会来的，当你离家越近...你和那台机器。

original: [Legion] Legion doesn't kill Legion. Caesar's orders?
translation: [军团] 军团不杀军团，凯撒的命令？

original: What kind of world would this be if Courier killed Courier.
translation: 如果邮差杀了邮差，这将是一个怎样的世界。

original: You've got enough distance ahead of you - save your breath for the road, don't waste it on words.
translation: 你前面还有很长的路 - 把你的呼吸留给道路吧，不要浪费在言语上。

original: [Legion] Legion does not kill Legion - but you're not that anymore. I'm going to kill you.
translation: [军团] 军团不杀军团...但是你已经不属于他们了。我会干掉你的。

original: If that's all that drives you, it won't last. The Legion... it won't last either.
translation: 如果这就是你的全部动力，它不会持续太久。军团...也不会持久。

original: [Legion] So... when you called me traitor in Hopeville, that title belongs to you.
translation: [军团] 所以...当你在黎明镇叫我叛徒的时候，那个头衔是属于你的。

original: No, it is a title you earned. Legion or not, you have betrayed more than you know.
translation: 不，这是你赢得的头衔。不管你是不是军团，你的背叛比你自己想象的要多。

original: [Legion] Seeing this place. It meant more to you than the Legion?
translation: [军团] 看看这个地方，对你来说比军团更重要吗？

original: Yes. And it did to you once, I'm sure of it.
translation: 是的。对你来说曾经也是，我确信这一点。

original: [Legion] Are you angry that this explosion undermined the Legion's plans? It was an accident.
translation: [军团] 你因为这次爆炸破坏了军团的计划而生气吗？那是个意外。

original: Accident? Ignorance is a choice. The Chip - a choice.
translation: 意外？无知是一种选择。芯片 - 也是一种。

original: As for anger... it is what I carry for the dead, and all that come here.
translation: 至于愤怒...这是我为死者和所有来到这里的人所背负的。

original: [Legion] If I destroyed the NCR in this place, why do you care?
translation: [军团] 如果我在这个地方摧毁了NCR，你还在乎什么？

original: Legion died here as well. What you did... that's not all that cuts at me.
translation: 军团也死在这。你所做的...并不是我身上所有的伤口。
